name: Publicly Accessible Azure PostgreSQL Single Servers with no/old TLS
query: { postgreSqlServers( where: { AND: [ { publicAccessBlocked: false } { firewallRules_SOME: { startIPAddress: "0.0.0.0" endIPAddress: "255.255.255.255" } } { tlsMinimumVersion_LT: 1.2 } ] } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
